h3.span: WiFi Access Across the Indian Valley School District

div.span: Indian Valley has taken efforts to make the internet more accessible for students and families

h3.span: Indian Valley Remote Lunch Program Update

div.span: On March 17th, Indian Valley Local Schools began offering a free sack lunch to any child (18 or under) in the Indian Valley community during our remote learning period. Due to the positive impact of this program, we want to further assist by including a breakfast with the current lunches being provided.
